# Swiss Participation in EU's Research Programmes

A portrait of the participation of Switzerland in FP7 and Horizon 2020 using EU public datasets.

> For official statistics, please visit [Facts and Figures on the Swiss Participation in the EU-Framework Programmes for Research and Innovation](https://www.sbfi.admin.ch/sbfi/en/home/research-and-innovation/international-cooperation-r-and-i/eu-framework-programmes-for-research/f-f-swiss-participation.html).
